CS offers a bare bones competitive game that all competitive players will enjoy. It does not offer any flashy graphics or crazy gameplay but instead gives a competitive environment where you will prove your skills through play. Incredibly rewarding to get kills and to rank up as well as creating a good team building experience. The community can be "toxic" at times but mainly supportive and allows you to mute players and yourself as well as completely shutting it off, however I would not recommend shutting it off as that is your only means of communication. The skins and trading is a very fun element if players want to invest money. Just be alert so as not to be scammed by another player. For parents who are sceptical of the blood it is very subtle and outdated graphics makes it less realistic however it will stick to wall behind players shot and will stay there until the end of the round. All and all I give CSGO a 8/10 for fun, a 6/10 for the communication, a 4/10 for blood and gore and a 10/10 for the competitive atmosphere, would recommend.
